title: Code Broken
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and Israel Gutierrez debate if Steve Kerr was right that Dillon Brooks “broke the code” with his foul on Gary Payton II and where they stand with the Celtics/Bucks series after Game 2.

itunes:subtitle: (debatable): Was Steve Kerr Right About Dillon Brooks Breaking The Code With His Foul?
